short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To use, type 'go' into the browsers searchbar followed by your tags.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension inspired by the firefox bookmark tagging feature. With this addon you can save your favorite websites and tag them (see Screenshot for an example). After that you type 'go' followed by your tag into the search bar and get your favorite websites suggested. Just select, hit enter and voil√° - you reached your site in no time!
